name: A debtor cannot be activated more than once
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected empty body for 409 response on double activation
assert ('{"errors":[{...dy active"}]}' == ''
  
  + {"errors":[{"code":"01031006E","description":"User is already active"}]} or '{"errors":[{"code":"01031006E","description":"User is already active"}]}' is None)
 +  where '{"errors":[{"code":"01031006E","description":"User is already active"}]}' = <Response [409]>.text
